tools.description: Creates comprehensive solution packages containing multiple related artifacts (widgets, scripts, rules). Manages dependencies and generates deployment documentation.

tools.name: snow_deployment_debug
tools.description: Provides detailed debugging information including authentication status, permissions, active sessions, and recent deployment logs for troubleshooting.

tools.name: snow_deployment_status
tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive deployment status including active deployments, recent history, success rates, and performance metrics.

tools.name: snow_export_artifact
tools.description: Exports ServiceNow artifacts (widgets, applications) to JSON/XML format for backup, version control, or migration purposes.

tools.name: snow_import_artifact
tools.description: Imports previously exported artifacts from JSON/XML files into ServiceNow. Validates compatibility and handles dependencies automatically.

tools.name: snow_rollback_deployment
tools.description: Rollback failed deployment by reverting to previous version or deleting artifact

tools.name: snow_update
tools.description: Update existing ServiceNow artifacts (widgets, pages, scripts, flows, etc.)

tools.name: snow_validate_deployment
tools.description: Validate artifact before deployment (ES5, coherence, dependencies, security)

tools.name: snow_analyze_artifact
tools.description: Performs comprehensive analysis of artifacts including dependencies, usage patterns, and optimization opportunities. Caches results for improved performance.

tools.name: snow_analyze_requirements
tools.description: Analyzes development requirements to identify dependencies, suggest reusable components, and create implementation roadmaps.

tools.name: snow_edit_artifact
tools.description: Modifies ServiceNow artifacts using natural language instructions. Includes automatic error handling, retry logic, and validation of changes.

tools.name: snow_edit_by_sysid
tools.description: Updates specific fields of an artifact using sys_id. Provides direct field-level modifications with validation.

tools.name: snow_find_artifact
tools.description: Finds ServiceNow artifacts using natural language queries. Searches cached memory first for performance, then queries ServiceNow directly if needed.

tools.name: snow_memory_search
tools.description: Searches cached ServiceNow artifacts in local memory for instant results without API calls.

tools.name: snow_orchestrate_development
tools.description: Orchestrates complex development workflows with intelligent agent coordination, shared memory, and real-time progress tracking.

tools.name: snow_sync_data_consistency
tools.description: Synchronizes cached data with ServiceNow, validates sys_id mappings, and repairs consistency issues. Includes automatic cache refresh and reindexing.

tools.name: snow_validate_live_connection
tools.description: Validates ServiceNow connection status, authentication tokens, and user permissions. Returns detailed diagnostics with response times.

tools.name: snow_create_saved_filter
tools.description: Create a saved filter for any ServiceNow table that appears in the filter dropdown

tools.name: snow_add_form_field
tools.description: Add field to form section

tools.name: snow_create_form_layout
tools.description: Create custom form layout

tools.name: snow_create_form_section
tools.description: Create form section

tools.name: snow_error_handler

tools.name: snow_exception_handler
tools.description: Handle exceptions with logging

tools.description: Add column to list view

tools.name: snow_create_list_layout
tools.description: Create a complete list layout with multiple columns for any ServiceNow table

tools.name: snow_create_list_view
tools.description: Create custom list view

tools.name: snow_create_related_list
tools.description: Create related list on form

tools.name: snow_convert_to_es5
tools.description: Convert modern JavaScript (ES6+) to ES5 for ServiceNow Rhino engine

tools.name: snow_list_supported_artifacts
tools.description: List all ServiceNow artifact types supported by local sync

tools.name: snow_pull_artifact
tools.description: Pull ServiceNow artifact to local files for editing with native tools

tools.name: snow_push_artifact
tools.description: Push locally edited artifact files back to ServiceNow with validation

tools.name: snow_sync_cleanup
tools.description: Clean up local artifact files after sync with retention policies

tools.description: Get status of locally synced artifacts including changes and validation

tools.description: Safely cleanup test artifacts from ServiceNow (dry-run enabled by default for safety)

tools.description: Discover table schema with fields, types, relationships, and metadata

tools.description: Create client-side script for form with type and field targeting

tools.description: Create reusable Script Include with client-callable support

tools.description: Create UI Action (button, context menu, form link) with client/server scripts

tools.description: Query Update Sets (get current or list multiple)

tools.description: Validates widget coherence by analyzing server/client/HTML component communication. Checks data bindings, action handlers, and method implementations.

tools.name: snow_validate_field
tools.description: Validate field value

tools.name: snow_validate_record
tools.description: Validate record against business rules

tools.name: snow_validate_sysid
tools.description: Validates sys_id existence and consistency across tables. Maintains artifact tracking for deployment integrity and rollback capabilities.

tools.name: snow_widget_test
tools.description: Executes comprehensive widget testing with multiple data scenarios. Validates client/server scripts, API calls, dependencies, and generates coverage reports.

tools.description: Analyzes patterns across incidents, requests, and problems to identify trends, common issues, and improvement opportunities

tools.description: Create interactive dashboards with multiple widgets

tools.description: Create security incident with automated threat correlation and priority assignment

tools.description: Creates security policies for access control and data protection. Configures enforcement levels, scope, and rule sets.

tools.name: snow_create_vulnerability_scan
tools.description: Creates vulnerability scanning configurations. Schedules scans, sets severity thresholds, and enables auto-remediation.

tools.name: snow_discover_security_frameworks
tools.description: Discovers security and compliance frameworks available in the instance for policy creation and auditing.

tools.description: Generate real-time security operations dashboard with key metrics

tools.name: snow_security_risk_assessment
tools.description: Perform comprehensive security risk assessment analyzing access controls, vulnerabilities, and security posture

tools.description: Assess vulnerability risk with automated CVSS scoring and remediation planning

description.en: Now Experience UI components and pages
description.nl: Now Experience UI componenten en paginas

tools.name: snow_analyze_uib_page_performance
tools.description: Analyze UI Builder page performance and get optimization recommendations

tools.description: Update data broker configuration including queries, caching, and refresh settings

tools.name: snow_create_uib_client_script
tools.description: Create client-side JavaScript for UI Builder pages

tools.name: snow_create_uib_client_state
tools.description: Create client state management for UI Builder pages

tools.name: snow_create_uib_data_broker
tools.description: Create data broker to connect UI Builder pages to ServiceNow data sources

tools.name: snow_create_uib_event
tools.description: Create custom events for UI Builder component communication

tools.name: snow_create_uib_page_registry
tools.description: Configure URL routing and access control for UI Builder pages

tools.name: snow_debug_widget_fetch
tools.description: Debug widget data fetching and server communication issues

tools.name: snow_uib_page_manage
tools.description: Unified UIB page management (create, delete, add_element, remove_element)

tools.name: snow_configure_mobile_app
tools.description: Configure ServiceNow mobile app

tools.name: snow_configure_offline_sync
tools.description: Configure offline synchronization settings for mobile applications. Controls which data is available offline.

tools.name: snow_create_mobile_action
tools.description: Creates a mobile action that users can trigger from the mobile app. Actions can navigate, execute scripts, or open forms.

tools.name: snow_create_mobile_layout
tools.description: Creates a custom mobile layout for forms and lists in the mobile app.

tools.name: snow_create_sp_page
tools.description: Create Service Portal page

tools.name: snow_create_sp_widget
tools.description: Create Service Portal widget

tools.name: snow_uib_component_manage
tools.description: Unified UIB component management (create, clone)

tools.name: snow_uib_discover
tools.description: Unified UI Builder discovery (pages, components, routes, page_usage)

tools.name: snow_discover_va_topics
tools.description: Discovers available Virtual Agent topics and their configurations.

tools.name: snow_create_complete_workspace
tools.description: Create Complete UX Workspace - Executes all 6 steps automatically: Experience → App Config → Page Macroponent → Page Registry → Route → Landing Page Route. Creates a fully functional workspace.

tools.name: snow_create_configurable_agent_workspace
tools.description: Create Configurable Agent Workspace using UX App architecture (sys_ux_app_route, sys_ux_screen_type). Creates workspace with screen collections for multiple tables.

tools.name: snow_create_ux_app_config
tools.description: STEP 2: Create UX App Configuration Record (sys_ux_app_config) - Contains workspace settings and links to the experience from Step 1.

tools.name: snow_create_ux_app_route
tools.description: STEP 5: Create Route Record (sys_ux_app_route) - Defines the URL slug that leads to the page.

tools.name: snow_create_ux_experience
tools.description: STEP 1: Create UX Experience Record (sys_ux_experience) - The top-level container for the workspace. ⚠️ REQUIRES: Now Experience Framework (UXF) enabled. ALTERNATIVE: Use traditional form/list configurations if UXF unavailable.

tools.name: snow_create_ux_page_macroponent
tools.description: STEP 3: Create Page Macroponent Record (sys_ux_macroponent) - Defines the actual page content that will be displayed.

tools.name: snow_create_ux_page_registry
tools.description: STEP 4: Create Page Registry Record (sys_ux_page_registry) - Registers the page for use within the workspace configuration.

tools.name: snow_discover_all_workspaces
tools.description: Discover all workspaces (UX Experiences, Agent Workspaces, UI Builder pages) with comprehensive details and usage analytics.

tools.name: snow_update_ux_app_config_landing_page
tools.description: STEP 6: Update App Configuration with Landing Page Route - Sets the default landing page for the workspace.

tools.name: snow_validate_workspace_configuration
tools.description: Validate workspace configuration for completeness, best practices, and potential issues across all workspace types.

tools.name: snow_create_workspace
tools.description: Create complete Agent Workspace with experience, config, routes, and lists
